summary: Lew Harper, a cool private investigator, is hired by a wealthy California matron to locate her kidnapped husband.
cast: Paul Newman|Lauren Bacall|Julie Harris|Arthur Hill|Janet Leigh|Pamela Tiffin|Robert Wagner|Robert Webber|Shelley Winters|Harold Gould|Roy Jenson|Strother Martin|Martin West|Jacqueline deWit|Eugene Iglesias|Richard Carlyle|Horace Brown|Steve Carruthers|Mary Gregory|Kathryn Janssen|China Lee|Lewis Marvin|James McHale|Andres Oropeza|Murray Pollack|Martin Priest|Cosmo Sardo|Tom Steele|Herbert Sullivan|Roseann Williams
title: Harper, investigador privado
